org.jpws.pwslib.data
Interface PwsFileListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
FilterRecordList, OrderedRecordList
public interface PwsFileListener

Interface defines a state change notification method for listeners for PWS record lists and their modifications. The type of events that may be issued are defined by the PwsFileEvent class.

See Also:
PwsRecordList
